feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2

What's Changed

  • web/flow: fix translate extract (cherry-pick #13208) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13210
  • web/user: fix display for RAC tile (cherry-pick #13211) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.0-rc3...version/2025.2.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2#fixed-in-202521

What's Changed

  • website/docs: remove Enterprise badge from RAC docs (cherry-pick #13069) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13216
  • website/docs: add new SSF provider docs (cherry-pick #13102) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13215
  • website/docs: add info about new perms for super-user in groups (cherry-pick #13188) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13217
  • website/docs: remove mention of wizard (cherry-pick #13126) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13219
  • website/docs: add paragraph about impossible travel (cherry-pick #13125) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13220
  • stages/authenticator_email: Email Authenticator Stage Documentation (cherry-pick #12853) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13218
  • website/docs: fix missing breaking entry for 2025.2 release notes (cherry-pick #13223) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13224
  • core: add pre-hydrated relative URL (cherry-pick #13243) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13246
  • stages/email: Fix email stage serialization (cherry-pick #13256) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13273
  • stages/authenticator_email: fix session cleanup test b (cherry-pick #13264) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.0...version/2025.2.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2#fixed-in-202522

What's Changed

  • website/docs: prepare for 2025.2.1 (cherry-pick #13277) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13279
  • enterprise/stages/source: fix dispatch method signature (cherry-pick #13321) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13326
  • *: fix stage incorrectly being inserted instead of appended (cherry-pick #13304) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13327
  • website/docs: update the 2025.2 rel notes (cherry-pick #13213) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13222
  • providers/proxy: kubernetes outpost: fix reconcile when only annotations changed (cherry-pick #13372) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13384
  • website/docs: fix build by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13385
  • web/user: ensure modal container on user-settings page is min-height: 100% (cherry-pick #13402) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13413
  • stages/authenticator_email: Fix Enroll dropdown in the MFA Devices page (cherry-pick #13404) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13414
  • lib/config: fix conn_max_age parsing (cherry-pick #13370) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13415
  • web/admin: fix display bug for assigned users in application bindings in the wizard (cherry-pick #13435) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13452
  • sources/oauth: ignore missing well-known keys (cherry-pick #13468) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13470
  • web/flows: fix missing padding on authenticator_validate card (cherry-pick #13420) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13519
  • web/user: show admin interface button on mobile (cherry-pick #13421) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13518
  • providers/rac: fix signals and Endpoint caching (cherry-pick #13529) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13531
  • sources/oauth: fix duplicate authentication (cherry-pick #13322) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13535
  • stages/identification: check captcha after checking authentication (cherry-pick #13533) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13551
  • website/docs: prepare for 2025.2.2 (cherry-pick #13552) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13553

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.1...version/2025.2.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.12.4
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.12#fixed-in-2024124

What's Changed

  • core: fix generic sources not being fetchable by pk by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12896
  • flows: fix inspector permission check by @BeryJu in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/12907
  • security: fix CVE-2025-29928 (cherry-pick #13695) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13701

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.12.3...version/2024.12.4

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2025.2.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2025.2#fixed-in-202523

What's Changed

  • admin: fix system API when using bearer token (cherry-pick #13651) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13654
  • stages/email: Clean newline characters in TemplateEmailMessage (cherry-pick #13666) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13667
  • outposts/ldap: fix paginator going into infinite loop (cherry-pick #13677) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13679
  • web/admin: reworked sync status card (cherry-pick #13625) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13692
  • core: fix core/user is_superuser filter (cherry-pick #13693) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13694
  • core: fix non-exploitable open redirect (cherry-pick #13696) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13698
  • stages/identification: refresh captcha on failure (cherry-pick #13697) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13699
  • security: fix CVE-2025-29928 (cherry-pick #13695) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/13700

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2025.2.2...version/2025.2.3
